name: Sabotage (Saccade)
description:
A bomb has been armed. Figure out the code combination before time runs out to avoid the obvious.

Sabotage is a party puzzle game with a strategic meta twist for 6 players.

Each player is assigned one of 6 unique roles along with a set of clues. To disarm the bomb, the Agent, the Spy, the Detective and the Journalist must work together in order figure out the right 4-digit defusal code.

But beware of the Saboteur and his Fanatic follower, who will do anything in their power to feed false clues to keep the others from disarming the bomb.
